HotelElement.Name: Four Seasons Resort Costa Rica at Peninsula Papagayo

Description.Text: Four Seasons Resort Costa Rica at Peninsula Papagayo is a luxury 5-star superior property offering picturesque accommodation in Golfo de Papagayo. Highlights include several outdoor swimming pools, a private beach and stunning views of Culebra Bay and the Pacific Ocean. Golfo de Papagayo is a stunning area located on the north-eastern coast. It boasts many beautiful beaches, while further inland can be found lush tropical forests. Places of interest include Allegro Papagayo, Playas del Coco and Playa Panama. The hotel is housed in a series of modern mid-rise buildings with traditional Costa Rican features. Facilities include several outdoor swimming pools, a spa, sauna, steam room, several tennis courts and a private beach. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Terraza rooms are approximately 56sqm and decorated in a luxurious style with wood floors, contemporary lighting and extravagant artwork on the walls. They feature a balcony with an inland view. Amenities include air-conditioning, tea and coffee equipment, a flat-screen satellite TV, mini-bar, safe, work desk and an en-suite bathroom. There are several dining venues onsite, offering North and Latin American cuisine, and Italian specialities. Guests can also enjoy a range of drinks and snacks at the hotel bars. Free parking is possible onsite. The hotel provides 24-hour reception, concierge and room service.
